name: Diner Mafia
description:
This is a game where you are a mafia member running a black market of diner goods. Ship your coffee beans and go fishing to sell goods to the diner manager!

Follow the path North to the beach to get to the ocean!

Once you obtain an item, you can go into the diner and sell it to the diner manager to make money.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD (PC) or the D-Pad (CPI)
  • "J" (PC) or "A" (CPI) to interact (sell stuff, enter buildings)

Check out our GitHub page for a more updated version of the game!

https://github.com/austin0209/diner-mafia
